title: Interest-free loan scheme aims to reach 20,000 people
description: People struggling with their finances can access small, zero-cost loans as part of a nationwide trial.

title: Why a Rwandan sports reporter fled his home
description: Rwandan journalists tell the BBC how oppression at home forced them to become refugees.

title: Rocket man fights Russian demand to send him back
description: Anatoly Lazarev was at the heart of Russia's space rocket programme before he fled to Hungary.

title: US parents turn to black market due to formula shortage
description: As the US grapples with a formula crisis, parents are turning to the black market for supplies.

title: Dame Kelly Holmes shares relief at coming out as gay
description: The athlete says she's going to "explode with excitement" as she gets rid of fear around her sexuality.

title: How Gabon saved its forest elephants
description: Biologist Lee White explains how creating national parks revived Gabon’s elephant population.

title: Spanish firefighters tackle raging wildfires
description: Temperature records have been broken in Spain and France as a heatwave sweeps across Europe.

title: Your pictures on the theme of 'great drives'

description: Iman Vellani plays Marvel’s first Muslim superhero headliner and says she could relate to the role.

title: Fifa study of Euros & Afcon finds half of all players abused online; Saka & Rashford most targeted
description: World governing body Fifa teams up with players' union Fifpro to identify people who target players with abusive social media posts.

title: Moroccans accuse French tycoon Jacques Bouthier of sexual harassment
description: The 75-year-old is already under judicial investigation in France for raping a minor and trafficking.

description: Temperatures soar as scientists warn heatwaves are striking earlier in the year due to climate change.

description: Arsenal striker Eddie Nketiah, who has been at the club since he was 14, agrees a new long-term contract with the Gunners.

description: England bowler Katherine Brunt retires from Test cricket to focus on the white-ball game.

description: Several stories lead Saturday's front pages, but the cost-of-living crisis continues to dominate.

title: Eurovision: Ukraine deserves to host 2023 contest, says Boris Johnson

description: The new head of the British Army says he has "temporarily lost trust" in the battalion involved.

title: War in Ukraine: Woman gives birth in UK after fleeing country
description: Staff arranged a call so Lesia Husar could introduce her husband, who is still in Ukraine, to their son.

title: Remains of UK journalist Phillips identified in Brazil

title: Ambulance Service staff unable to drive new vehicles due to height

title: African brain drain: '90% of my friends want to leave'
description: A new survey reveals 52% of young Africans are considering emigrating - some of them told the BBC why.

title: David Nott: Surgeon uses war trauma dummy to help Ukrainian doctors
